name: SuperCalc Macro File
summary: Learn about .XQT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Sorcim released SuperCalc in 1980, and it became a popular spreadsheet application throughout the decade. However, it was eventually discontinued after more modern software like Microsoft Excel debuted.

description: An XQT file is a macro file used by SuperCalc, a now-discontinued spreadsheet program. It contains a set of instructions or commands that automate tasks within SuperCalc, such as mathematical calculations, spreadsheet formatting, and data manipulation. XQT macros allow users to record repetitive tasks so they do not have to input every step manually, improving efficiency and accuracy.

instructions: You can open XQT files with SuperCalc. However, the software is no longer available.
